name: Stargazers
description:
Stargazers is a one-button local multiplayer party game.

You compete against your opponent to get the required number of stars: whenever you push your button, you get the stars in the global pile.

But if anyone pushes the button too early... there will be no stars in that pile !

Will you trust your opponent ?

Controls:

  • Player 1: Z
  • Player 2: M
  • Select goal: A, D / Left, Right

View source code.
